00021 #ifndef KGLVIEW_H
00022 #define KGLVIEW_H
00023 
00024 #include <GL/glew.h>
00025 #include <KDebug>
00026 #include <QGLWidget>
00027 #include <QTimer>
00028 #include <QDialog>
00029 
00030 #include "kglengine.h"
00031 #include "kglscreenconfig.h"
00032 class KGLView : public QGLWidget
00033 {
00034     Q_OBJECT
00035 public:
00036     explicit KGLView( QSize size, float frameRate ,QWidget* parent = 0);
00037     explicit KGLView(KGLEngine * engine,QWidget * parent = 0);
00038     explicit KGLView(QWidget * parent=0);
00039     ~KGLView();
00040 
00041     void setEngine(KGLEngine * engine)
00042     {
00043         m_engine = engine;
00044     }
00045 
00046     KGLEngine * engine()
00047     {
00048         return m_engine;
00049     }
00050 
00051     void start()
00052     {
00053         m_timer->start(m_frameRate);
00054         m_fpsTimer->start(1000);
00055     }
00056 
00057     void stop()
00058     {
00059         m_timer->stop();
00060         m_fpsTimer->stop();
00061     }
00062 
00063     inline void setFrameRate(int f)
00064     {
00065         m_frameRate=f;
00066         stop();
00067         start();
00068     }
00069 
00070 
00071     inline void setOrthoView(QRectF &rect) {
00072         m_orthoView = rect;
00073         resizeGL(width(), height());
00074     }
00075 
00076     inline void setOrthoView(const float& left,const float& right,const float& bottom,const float& top)
00077     {
00078         m_orthoView.setLeft(left);
00079         m_orthoView.setRight(right);
00080         m_orthoView.setBottom(bottom);
00081         m_orthoView.setTop(top);
00082         resizeGL(width(),height());
00083     }
00084 
00085 
00086     inline QPointF mapToGL(const QPointF &p) {
00087         const int CURSOR_HACK = 0x18; // cursor inversion
00088         int side = qMin(width(), height());
00089         return QPointF(
00090                 m_orthoView.width() * ( p.x() - width() / 2 ) / side,
00091                 m_orthoView.height() * ( p.y() - height() / 2 - CURSOR_HACK ) / side
00092                 );
00093     }
00094     
00095     inline QPointF mapFromGL(const QPointF &p) {
00096         const int CURSOR_HACK = 0x18; // cursor inversion
00097         int side = qMin(width(), height());
00098         return QPointF(
00099                 side * p.x() / m_orthoView.width() + width() / 2,
00100                 side * p.y() / m_orthoView.height() + height() / 2 + CURSOR_HACK
00101                 );
00102     }
00103 
00104     KGLScreenConfig * screenConfig(){return m_screenConfig;}
00105     //=== Flags ====
00106     inline void setMode(GLenum mode)
00107     {
00108         m_mode=mode;
00109         initializeGL();
00110     }
00111 
00112     inline void setAxisShow(bool b)
00113     {
00114         m_axisShow=b;
00115     }
00116 
00117     inline bool isAxisShow()
00118     {
00119         return m_axisShow;
00120     }
00121 
00122     inline void setInfoShow(bool b)
00123     {
00124         m_infoShow = b;
00125     }
00126 
00127     inline bool isInfoShow()
00128     {
00129         return m_axisShow;
00130     }
00131 
00132     //        inline void setShadeModel(GLenum mode);
00133 
00134     bool isExtensionSupported(QString name)
00135     {
00136         return glewIsSupported(name.toUtf8());
00137     }
00138 
00139     bool isShaderSupported()
00140     {
00141         return m_isShaderSupported;
00142     }
00143 
00144     float fps()
00145     {
00146         return m_fps;
00147     }
00148 
00149     //===DRAW function
00150     void drawRepere(float scalex, float scaley);
00151     void drawInfo();
00152     void drawGLItems();
00153 
00154 public slots:
00155     virtual void nextFrame();
00156     inline void calculFps()
00157     {
00158         m_fps = m_countFrame;
00159         m_countFrame = 0;
00160     }
00161 
00162     void goFullScreen();
00163 
00164     inline void leaveFullScreen()
00165     {
00166         m_screenConfig->restore();
00167         if ( parentWidget() != NULL)
00168         {
00169             parentWidget()->showNormal();
00170         }
00171         else
00172             showNormal();
00173     }
00174 
00175 protected:
00176     void saveResolution();
00177     bool initGlew();
00178     void init();
00179     void initializeGL();
00180     void resizeGL(int w, int h);
00181     void paintGL();
00182

00186     QRectF m_orthoView;
00187     float m_countFrame;
00188     float m_fps;
00189     float m_frameRate;
00190     float m_ratio;
00191     float m_sleep;
00192     QTimer* m_timer;
00193     QTimer* m_fpsTimer;
00194 
00195     bool m_axisShow;
00196     bool m_infoShow;
00197     bool m_isShaderSupported;
00198     GLenum m_mode;
00199     int m_originalResolution;
00200 };
